Public transport is available in the centre of the village of Cap Skirring, which is 1 km away. Description:
HotelDescription#This family-friendly hotel is located in the south of Cap Skirring, approximately 10 minutes from Cap Skirring village and 75 km from the town of Ziguinchor. The hotel is located on the beach in a beautiful tropical garden. The hotel is approximately 10 minutes from the airport.

This all-inclusive hotel, renovated in 2007, features 92 beach bungalows in a quiet tropical garden in front of the beach. The hotel's architecture is African style and the facilities include 2 restaurants, 2 bars, currency exchange facilities, souvenir shop, and games room. The hotel features a lobby with 24-hour reception and check-out service, hotel safe, cloakroom, hairdressing salon, conference facilities and a car park. For an additional fee, guests can take advantage of the room and laundry services and bicycle hire.

The beach bungalows are equipped with double beds, a separate toilet and a bathroom with shower and bath, closet and table with chair. They also include a hairdryer, satellite/cable TV, minibar, individually regulated air conditioning, a safe and a balcony or terrace.

There is an outdoor swimming pool with sun loungers and parasols and a poolside snack bar. Tennis, VTT, pétanque, beach volleyball, table tennis, canoeing, surfing, mini-golf, surfcasting and the giant's chest game are just a few of the activities that this hotel offers. There is a hotel gym, and basketball, handball and volleyball are also offered. For an additional fee, guests can receive massage treatments and go jet skiing and windsurfing.

Guests can serve themselves at the breakfast, lunch and dinner buffets. Drinks are also included.

From the airport, take the road towards Kabrousse and the hotel is on your right at about 10 km.
